title: Kuo: iPhone 15 Pro Max Seeing 'Robust' Demand, Shipping Estimates Extending Into November
content:
There has been "robust" customer demand for the iPhone 15 Pro Max since the device became available to pre-order on Friday, according to supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.


In a blog post on Medium today, Kuo said iPhone 15 Pro Max demand has outpaced that for the iPhone 14 Pro Max during the equivalent period last year. However, he said demand for the smaller iPhone 15 Pro model is weaker than for the iPhone 14 Pro so far, which he said could be the result of more customers choosing to buy the Pro Max model this year.

Kuo did note that the iPhone 15 Pro Max entered mass production later than the other devices in the iPhone 15 series, which has contributed to the device's lengthy shipping delays. Some configurations of the iPhone 15 Pro Max are currently estimated for delivery in November on Apple's online store.
